bibl.title: Telegram from Philip Showalter Hench to George P. Berry, November 26, 1952

div1.p: Hench informs Berry, of Harvard University Medical School, that the Cubans are delighted that a wreath in memory of Wood will be laid at the upcoming Camp Lazear dedication.

div1.head: Telegram from Philip Showalter Hench to George P. Berry, November 26, 1952
div1.opener:
WESTERN
UNION
1205
W. P. MARSHALL, PRESIDENT
Send the following message, subject to the terms on back hereof, which are hereby agreed to
November 26, 1952
Dr. George P. Berry Dean of the Medical School
Harvard University
Boston, Massachusetts
div1.p:
CUBANS DELIGHTED ABOUT WOOD MEMORIAL WREATH. SUGGEST NOTIFY ALUMNUS CASWELL
TO PROCEED. CAN CONTACT DR. RODRIGUEZ EXPOSITO OR DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA, MARTI
219, MARIANAO, HAVANA NOW OR ME HOTEL NACIONAL THIS SUNDAY. HEARTY THANKS.
